descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=6]Bone Dagger Collection[/size][/color]

[size=5]
Hi there, what we have here is five daggers made with bones of some sort. There are no sheaths included with them.

However they are all compatible with Dual Sheath Redux  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?. So you can wear two  of the same or mix and match.
[/size]




[size=6]Update: Fully compatible with Hunterborn http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33201/?
By Dragonsong

Bone Dagger Collection
Replacement esp for Hunterborn

Load Order
Hunterborn.esp
Bone Dagger Collection.esp

Recipe Changes

Barsmid
Crafted Scrimshaw - large animal bone, sharp rock, leather strips and tempered with sharp rock

Boovar
Crafted Forge - large animal bone, iron ingot, leather strips and tempered with iron ingot

Brjotaa
Crafted Scrimshaw - large animal bone, small animal bone, leather strips and tempered with large animal bone

Flint
Crafted Scrimshaw - large animal bone, sharp rock, leather strips and tempered with sharp rock

Rekaa
Crafted Forge - large animal bone, steel ingot, leather strips and tempered with steel ingot

All daggers tempered at the sharpening wheel

Stat changes
Barsmid, Boovar, Flint equiv iron dagger dmg 4
Brjotaa, Rekaa equiv steel dagger dmg 5
All daggers reach 0.7 and speed 1.3

Download either the 1k or 2k version and
Replace esp with [/size]
[size=6]esp for Hunterborn[/size]

[size=5]
Special thanks to Teabag86 for making this possible[/size]
[size=4]

[size=5]

Armor in Screenshot
[/size][/size][size=5]
Crimson Twilight Armor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?
 
Installation:
-Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder. Or use mod manager of choice.

I hope you all enjoy these as much as I did making them...Cheers :)

Thanks to Bethesda for  an awesome game and to all of you  and the folks at Nexus...Cheers
[/size][size=4][size=5]
Any questions and or comments are welcome. Thank yo[/size]u.[/size][/center][size=4]
[/size]
author: tarll
